page.title: 03Religion
page.content: The local rector is on the governing bodies of a number of schools in the area and through his connections with a bishop in Zambia who has visited St. Margaret's School in 1985, the children have made and sent a book about their village to Zambia. This book has been used in a number of schools in Zambia. The children from the village annually visit Lincoln Cathedral for a special service for all children attending church schools in the county. At this service, children from the school contribute readings and prayers which they have produced in school.
